text: the_master Zachary did n't return from the hunt last night .
darla The Slayer .
the_master Zachary was strong , and he was careful . And still the Slayer takes him ... as she has taken so many of my family . It wears thin . Collin , what would you do about it ?
collin I 'd annihilate her .
the_master Out of the mouths of babes ... .
darla Let me do it , Master . Let me kill her for you .
the_master You have a personal interest in this .
darla I do n't get to have any fun .
the_master I will send the Three .
darla The Three ?
boy Get it ! Go get it , right there !
Girl I got it !
Girl Free drink , please .
willow_rosenberg Ah , the fumigation party .
buffy_summers Hmm ?
willow_rosenberg It 's an annual tradition . The closing of the Bronze for a few days to nuke the cockroaches ?
buffy_summers Oh .
willow_rosenberg It 's a lot of fun ... What 's it like where * you * are ?
buffy_summers I 'm ... . sorry , I was just ... . thinking about things ... .
willow_rosenberg So , we 're talking about a guy ?
buffy_summers Not exactly a guy . For us to have a conversation about a guy , there 'd have to be a guy for us to have a conversation about . Is that a sentence ?
willow_rosenberg You lack a guy .
buffy_summers I do . Which is fine with me , most of the time , but ... .
willow_rosenberg What about Angel ?
buffy_summers Angel ? I can just see him in a relationship . ' Hi , honey , you 're in grave danger . I 'll see you next month . '
willow_rosenberg He 's not around much , it 's true .
buffy_summers When he is around ... it 's like the lights dim everywhere else . You know how it 's like that with some guys ?
willow_rosenberg Oh , yeah !
xander_harris Hey , Annie ! Dino , just leaving !
cordelia_chase Ouch ! Please get your extreme oafishness off my two - hundred - dollar shoes !
xander_harris I 'm sorry , I was just ... .
cordelia_chase ... getting off the dance floor before Annie Vega 's boyfriend squashes you like a bug ?
xander_harris Oh , so you noticed .
cordelia_chase Uh - huh .
xander_harris Yeah , thanks for being so understanding .
cordelia_chase Sure .
xander_harris Y'know , hey , I do n't know what everyone 's talking about . That outfit does n't make you look like a hooker !
xander_harris Boy , that Cordelia is a regular breath of vile air . What are you vixens up to ?
willow_rosenberg Just sitting here , watching our barren lives pass us by . Oh , look , a cockroach .
xander_harris Whoa , well , let 's stop this crazy whirligig of fun ! I 'm dizzy !
buffy_summers Alright , now I 'm infecting those nearest and dear to me . I 'm gon na call it a night .
willow_rosenberg Oh , do n't go !
xander_harris Uh , yeah ! It 's early ! We could , um , dance !
buffy_summers Rain check ? Good night .
willow_rosenberg Want a free drink ?
buffy_summers It 's late , I 'm tired , and I do n't wanna play games . Show yourself .
buffy_summers Wuh !
buffy_summers Ooo ! Okay , okay , nice ... .
buffy_summers Okay , okay ... Look , I really do n't wanna fight all three of you ... unless I have to .
angel Good dogs do n't ... ... * bite * !
buffy_summers Look out !
buffy_summers Run !
buffy_summers Get in ! C'mon !
angel It 's alright . A vampire ca n't come in unless it 's invited .
buffy_summers I 've heard that before , but I 've never put it to the test . Oh ... I 'll go get some bandages , just ... take your jacket and your shirt off .
buffy_summers Nice tattoo . I was lucky you came along . How did you happen to come along ?
angel I live nearby . I was just out walking .
buffy_summers So , you were n't following me ? I just had this feeling you were .
angel Why would I do that ?
buffy_summers You tell me . You 're the Mystery Guy that appears out of nowhere . I 'm not saying I 'm not happy about it tonight , but ... if you are hanging around I 'd like to know why .
angel Maybe I like you .
buffy_summers Maybe ... .
joyce_summers Hi ! What are you doing ?
buffy_summers There 's a lot of weird people outside at night ... .
buffy_summers ... I just feel better with you safe and sound inside . You must be beat .
joyce_summers I am . We 're a little gallery . You have no idea how much ... .
buffy_summers Well , then why do n't you go upstairs and get into bed , and I can bring you some hot tea ?
joyce_summers That 's sweet ! What 'd you do ?
buffy_summers Ca n't a daughter just be concerned about her mother ?
joyce_summers Hi .
angel Hi .
buffy_summers Oh ! Okay ... Um ... Angel , uh , this is my mom . Mom , this is Angel . Uh , we ran into each other on the way home .
angel Nice to meet you .
joyce_summers What do you do , Angel ?
buffy_summers He 's a student . Uh , first year community college . Angel 's been helping me with my history , you know I 've been toiling there .
joyce_summers It 's a little late for tutoring . I 'm gon na go to bed , and , uh , Buffy ?
buffy_summers I 'll say good night and do the same !
joyce_summers It was nice to meet you .
buffy_summers Good night ! We 'll hook up soon and do that study thing !
angel Look , I do n't wanna get you in any more trouble ... .

buffy_summers And I do n't wanna get you dead . They could still be out there . So , uh , oh ... . two of us , one bed . That does n't work . Um , why do n't you take the bed ? Y'know , you 're wounded ... .
angel I 'll take the floor .
buffy_summers Uh , no , that 's not ... .
angel Oh , believe me , I 've had worse .
buffy_summers Okay . Um , then why do n't you check and see if the Fang Gang is still loitering and , um , keep your back turned while I change ?
angel I do n't see them .
buffy_summers Y'know , I 'm the Chosen One , it 's my job to fight guys like that . What 's your excuse ?
angel Uh , somebody has to .
buffy_summers Well , what does your family think of your career choice ?
angel They 're dead .
buffy_summers Was it vampires ?
angel I - it was .
buffy_summers I 'm sorry .
angel It was a long while ago .
buffy_summers So , this is a vengeance gig for you .
angel Y - you even look pretty when you go to sleep .
buffy_summers Well , when I wake up it 's an entirely different story .
buffy_summers Here . Sleep tight .
buffy_summers Angel ?
angel Hmm ?
buffy_summers Do you snore ?
angel I do n't know . It 's been a long time since anybody 's been in a position to let me know .
xander_harris He spent the night ? In your room ? In your bed ?
buffy_summers Not * in * my bed , * by * my bed .
willow_rosenberg That is so romantic ! Did you , uh ... . I mean , did he , uh ... .
buffy_summers Perfect gentleman .
xander_harris Buffy , c'mon , wake up and smell the seduction . It 's the oldest trick in the book .
buffy_summers What ? Saving my life ? Getting slashed in the ribs ?
xander_harris Duh ! I mean , guys'll do anything to impress a girl . I - I once drank an entire gallon of Gatorade without taking a breath .
willow_rosenberg It was pretty impressive . Although later there was an ick factor .

rupert_giles Can we steer this riveting conversation back to the events that happened earlier in the evening ? You left the Bronze and were set upon by three unusually virile vampires . Did they look like this ?
buffy_summers Yeah . What 's with the uniforms ?
rupert_giles It seems you encountered the Three . Warrior vampires , very proud and very strong .
willow_rosenberg How is it you always know this stuff ? You always know what 's going on . I never know what 's going on .
rupert_giles Well , you were n't here from midnight until six researching it .
willow_rosenberg No , I was sleeping .
rupert_giles Uh , o - obviously you 're hurting the Master very much . He , he would n't send the , the Three for just anyone . We must step up our training with weapons .
xander_harris Buffy , you should stay at my house until these Samurai guys are history .
buffy_summers What ?
xander_harris Ah - ah - ah , do n't worry about Angel , Willow can run to your house and tell him to get out of town fast .

rupert_giles Angel and Buffy are , are not in any immediate jeopardy . Eventually the Master will send someone else , but in the mean time the Three , having failed , will offer their own lives in penance .
Vampire We failed in our duty , and now our lives belong to you .

the_master Pay attention , child . You are the Anointed , and there is much you must learn . With power comes responsibility . True , they did fail , but also true , we who walk at night share a common bond . The taking of a life I 'm not talking about humans , of course is a serious matter .
collin So you would spare them ?
the_master Hmm . I am weary , and their deaths will bring me little joy .
the_master Of course , sometimes a little is enough .
buffy_summers Cool ! Crossbow ! Huh . Check out these babies . Hmm . Goodbye stakes , hello flying fatality . What can I shoot ?
rupert_giles Um , nothing . The crossbow comes later .

rupert_giles You must first become proficient with the basic tools of combat . And let 's begin ... ... with the quarterstaff . Which , incidentally , will , uh , require countless hours of vigorous training . I speak from experience .
buffy_summers Giles , 20th Century ? I 'm not gon na be fighting Friar Tuck .

rupert_giles You never know with whom or what you 'll be fighting . And these traditions have been handed down through the ages . Now , you show me good , steady progress with the quarterstaff , and in due course we 'll discuss the crossbow . Put on your pads .
buffy_summers I 'm not gon na need pads to fight you .
rupert_giles Well , we 'll see about that . En garde !
rupert_giles Good . Let 's move on to the crossbow .
buffy_summers Angel ?
angel Hey .
buffy_summers Brought you some dinner . It 's a little plateless , sorry .
buffy_summers So ! What 'd you do all day ?
angel Uh , I read a little .
angel And just thought about a lot of things . Buffy , I ... .

buffy_summers My diary ? You read my diary ? That is * not * okay ! A diary is like a person 's most private place ! I ... You do n't even know what I was writing about ! ' Hunk ' can mean a lot of things , bad things . And , and when it says that your eyes are ' penetrating ' , I meant to write ' bulging ' .
angel Buffy ... .

buffy_summers And ' A ' does n't even stand for ' Angel ' for that matter , it stands for ... . ' Achmed ' , a charming foreign exchange student , so that whole fantasy part has nothing to even do with you at all ... .
angel Your mother moved your diary when she came in to straighten up . I watched from the closet . I did n't read it , I swear .
buffy_summers Oh ! Oh .
angel I did a lot of thinking today . I really ca n't be around you . Because when I am ... .
buffy_summers Hey , no big . Water ... . over the bridge , under the bridge ... .
angel When I am all I can ever think about is how badly I want to kiss you .
buffy_summers ... over the dam ... Kiss me ?
angel I 'm older than you , and this ca n't ever ... I better go .
buffy_summers H - how much older ?
angel I should ... .
buffy_summers ... .go ... . You said ... .
buffy_summers What ? What is it ? What 's wrong ?
joyce_summers Buffy , what happened ?
buffy_summers Uh , nothing . I saw a shadow .
willow_rosenberg Angel 's a vampire ?
buffy_summers I ca n't believe this is happening . One minute we were kissing , and the next minute ... Can a vampire ever be a good person ? Could n't it happen ?

rupert_giles A vampire is n't a person at all . It may have the movements , the , the memories , even the personality of the person that it took over , but i - it 's still a demon at the core , there is no halfway .
willow_rosenberg So that 'd be a no , huh ?
buffy_summers Well , then what was he doing ? Why was he good to me ? Was it all some part of the Master 's plan ? It does n't make sense !

xander_harris Alright , uh ... ... you have a problem , and it 's not a small one . Let 's take a breath and look at this calmly and objectively . Angel 's a vampire . You 're a Slayer . I think it 's obvious what you have to do .
rupert_giles Uh , it is a Slayer 's duty ... .
xander_harris I - I know you have feelings for this guy , but it 's not like you 're in love with him , right ?
xander_harris You 're in love with a vampire ? ! What , are you outta your mind ? !
cordelia_chase What ? !
xander_harris Not vampire ... How could you love an umpire ? Everyone hates 'em !

cordelia_chase Where did you get that dress ? This is a one - of - a - kind Todd Oldham . Do you know how much this dress cost ? Is this a knockoff ? This is a knockoff , is n't it ? ! Some cheesy knockoff ! This is exactly what happens when you sign these free trade agreements !
buffy_summers You think * we * have problems ... .
angel Who 's here ?
darla A friend .
darla Hi . It 's been a while .
angel A lifetime .
darla Or two , but who 's counting ?
angel What 's with the Catholic schoolgirl look ? Last time I saw you it was kimonos .
darla And last time I saw you it was n't high school girls . Do n't cha like ? Remember Budapest ? Turn of the century ? You were such a bad boy during that earthquake .
angel You did some damage yourself .

darla Is there anything better than a natural disaster ? The panic . The people lost in the streets . It 's like picking fruit off the vine . Nice ! You 're living above ground , like one of them . You and your new friend are attacking us , like one of them . But guess what , precious ? You 're not one of them .
darla Are you ?
angel No . But I 'm not exactly one of you either .
darla Is that what you tell yourself these days ?

darla You 're not exactly living off quiche . You and I both know what you hunger for . What you need . Hey , it 's nothing to be ashamed of . It 's who we are . It 's what makes eternal life worth living . Mm . You can only suppress your real nature for so long . You can feel it brewing inside of you . I hope I 'm around when it explodes .
angel Maybe you do n't wanna be .

darla I 'm not afraid of you . I bet she is , though . Or maybe I 'm underestimating her . Talk to her . Tell her about the curse . Maybe she 'll come around . And if she still does n't trust you , you know where I 'll be .
rupert_giles Here 's something at last .
xander_harris Can you please warn us before you do that ?
rupert_giles There 's nothing about Angel in the texts , but it suddenly occurred to me that it 's been ages since I 've read the diaries of any of the watchers before me .
willow_rosenberg That musta been so embarrassing when you thought he had read your diary , but then it turned out he had n't , but then he felt the same way ... I 'm listening .
rupert_giles There 's mention some two hundred years ago in Ireland of , of Angelus , the one with the angelic face .
buffy_summers They got that right .
xander_harris I 'm not saying anything , I have nothing to say .
rupert_giles Does this , uh , Angel have , um , a tattoo behind his right shoulder ?
buffy_summers Yeah , it 's a , it 's a bird or something .
xander_harris Now I 'm sayin ' something . You saw him naked ?
willow_rosenberg So , Angel 's been around for a while .
rupert_giles Not long for a vampire . Uh , two hundred and forty years or so .
buffy_summers Huh ! Two hundred and forty . Well , he said he was older .

rupert_giles Angelus leaves Ireland , uh , wreaks havoc in , in Europe for , uh , several decades , and then , um , about eighty years ago , the most curious thing happens . He , he comes to , uh , to America , um , shuns other vampires , and , and lives alone . There 's , there 's no , no record of him hunting here .
willow_rosenberg So he * is * a good vampire ! I mean , on a scale of one to ten , ten being someone who 's killing and maiming every night , and one being someone who 's ... not .
rupert_giles I say that there 's no record , but , uh , vampires hunt and kill . It 's , it 's what they do .
xander_harris Fish got ta swim , birds got ta fly .
buffy_summers He could 've fed on me . He did n't .
xander_harris Question : a hundred years or so before he came to our shores , what was he like then ?
rupert_giles Uh , like all of them . Uh , a vicious , violent animal .
darla Do n't think I 'm not grateful , you letting me kill the Three .
the_master How can my children learn if I do everything for them ?
darla But you 've got ta let me take care of the Slayer .
the_master Oh ! You 're giving me orders now !
darla Okay , then , we 'll just do nothing while she takes us out one by one .
the_master Do I sense a plan , Darla ? Share ... .
darla Angel kills her and comes back to the fold .
the_master Angel ! He was the most vicious creature I ever met . I miss him .
darla So do I.
the_master Why would he kill her if he feels for her ?
darla To keep her from killing him .
the_master Hmm . You see how we all work together for the common good ? That 's how a family is supposed to function !
willow_rosenberg Okay , so let 's review .
willow_rosenberg Reconstruction began when ? Buffy ?
buffy_summers Huh ? Oh ! Um , reconstruction ... Uh , reconstruction began after the ... construction , which was ... shoddy , so they had to reconstruct .
willow_rosenberg After the destruction of the Civil War .
buffy_summers Right . Civil War . During which Angel was already , like , a hundred and change ... .
willow_rosenberg Are we gon na talk about boys , or are we gon na help you pass history ?
willow_rosenberg Sometimes I have this fantasy that Xander 's just gon na grab me and kiss me right on the lips .
buffy_summers You want Xander , you 've got ta speak up , girl !
willow_rosenberg No , no , no , no . No speaking up . That way leads to madness and sweaty palms .
willow_rosenberg Okay , so here 's something I got ta know . When Angel kissed you ... I mean before he turned into ... how was it ?
buffy_summers Unbelievable !
willow_rosenberg Wow ! And it is kinda novel how he 'll stay young and handsome forever , although you 'll still get wrinkly and die , and ... Oh , and what about the children ? I 'll be quiet now .
buffy_summers No , it 's okay . I need to hear this . I need to get over him so I can ... .
willow_rosenberg So that you can ... .

buffy_summers Like Xander said , I 'm the Slayer , and he 's a ... vampire . God , I ca n't ! He 's never done anything to hurt me ... Okay , no , I need to stop thinking about this . Okay , let 's give another half an hour and maybe something will sink in . And then I 'm going home for some major moping .
willow_rosenberg Okay . The era of the congressional reconstruction , usually called radical ... .
joyce_summers Hello ?
darla Hi ! I 'm Darla ? A friend of Buffy 's ?
joyce_summers Oh ! Nice to meet you .
darla She did n't mention anything about me coming over for a study date , did she ?
joyce_summers No , I thought she was studying with Willow at the library .
darla She is . Willow 's the Civil War expert , but then I was supposed to help her with the War of Independence . My family kinda goes back to those days .
joyce_summers Well , I , I know she 's supposed to be home soon . Would you like to come in and wait ?
darla It 's very nice of you to invite me into your home .
joyce_summers You 're welcome . I 've been wrestling with the IRS all night . Would you like something to eat ?
darla Yes , I would !
joyce_summers Let 's see what we have . Do you feel like something little or something big ?
darla Something big !
angel Let her go !
darla I just had a little , there 's plenty more . Are n't you hungry for something warm after all this time ? Come on , Angel . Just say ' Yes ' !
darla Welcome home !
buffy_summers Hey ! I 'm home .
buffy_summers You 're not welcome here . You come near us and I 'll kill you .
buffy_summers Mom ! Mom , can you hear me ? ! Yes , I need an ambulance , 1630 Revello Drive ! My mother cut herself , she lost a lot of blood ! Please , please hurry ! Mom !
xander_harris Hey , Buffy !
xander_harris Oh , my God !
willow_rosenberg What happened ? !
buffy_summers Angel !
buffy_summers Do you remember anything , Mom ?
joyce_summers Just , um , your friend came over ... . I was gon na make a snack ... .
buffy_summers My friend ?
joyce_summers I guess I slipped and cut my neck on ... The doctor said it looked like a barbecue fork . We do n't have a barbecue fork . Are you another doctor ?
buffy_summers Oh ! Um ... No , Mom , this is Mr. Giles .
joyce_summers Oh , the librarian from your school ! What 's he doing here ?
rupert_giles Uh , I - I just came to pay my respects , wish you a speedy recovery .
joyce_summers Boy , the teachers really * do * care in this town .
buffy_summers Get some rest now .
buffy_summers She 's gon na be okay . They , they gave her some iron ... . Her , uh , blood count was a , a little ... .
rupert_giles ... a little low . It presents itself like mild anemia . Uh , you , you were , uh , lucky you got to her as soon as you did .
buffy_summers Lucky ? Stupid .
xander_harris Buff , it 's not your fault .
buffy_summers No ? I invited him into my home . Even after I knew who he was , what he was , and I did n't do anything about it ... 'cause I had feelings for him , because I cared about him .
willow_rosenberg If you care about somebody you care about them . You ca n't change that by ... .
buffy_summers ... killing them ? Maybe not . But I think it 's a start .
xander_harris Uh , we 'll keep an eye on your mom .
rupert_giles Buffy !
buffy_summers You ca n't stop me . The Three found me near the Bronze and so did he . He lives nearby .
rupert_giles This is no ordinary vampire . If there is such a thing . Now , he knows you , he , he 's faced the Three ! I think this is gon na take more than a simple stake .
buffy_summers So do I.
darla She 's out hunting you right now .
darla She wants to kill you .
angel Leave me alone .
darla What did you think ? Did you think she would understand ? That she would look at your face ... your true face ... and give you a kiss ?

darla For a hundred years you 've not had a moment 's peace because you will not accept who you are . That 's all you have to do . Accept it . Do n't let her hunt you down . Do n't whimper and mewl like a mangy human . Kill ! Feed ! Live !
angel Alright !
darla What do you want ?
angel I want it finished !
darla That 's good . You 're hurting me . That 's good , too .
joyce_summers She talks about you all the time .
joyce_summers It 's important to have teachers who make an impression .
rupert_giles She makes quite an impression herself .
joyce_summers I - I know she 's having trouble with history . I - is it too difficult for her or is she not applying herself ?
rupert_giles She lives very much in the ' now ' , um , and , uh , history , of course , is , is very much about the , uh ... . the ' then ' . B - b - but there 's no reason ... .
joyce_summers She 's studying with Willow , she 's studying with Darla , I - I mean , she is trying .
rupert_giles Darla ? I - I - I do n't believe I know , uh ... .
joyce_summers Her friend , the one who came over tonight .
rupert_giles Darla came to your house tonight ? Sh - she 's the friend that you mentioned earlier ?
joyce_summers Poor thing , I must 've frightened her half to death when I fainted . Someone should really check and make sure she 's alright .
rupert_giles Yes , someone should , right away . I 'll do it .
joyce_summers That school is amazing !
rupert_giles We have a problem .
buffy_summers I know you 're there . And I know what you are .
angel Do you ?
angel I 'm just an animal , right ?
buffy_summers You 're not an animal . Animals I like .
angel Let 's get it done !
angel C'mon ! Do n't go soft on me now !
angel Little wide .
buffy_summers Why ? Why did n't you just attack me when you had the chance ? Was it a joke ? To make me feel for you and then ... I 've killed a lot of vampires . I 've never hated one before .
angel Feels good , does n't it ? Feels simple .
buffy_summers I invited you into my home and then you attacked my family !
angel Why not ? I killed mine . I killed their friends ... and their friend 's children ... For a hundred years I offered ugly death to everyone I met , and I did it with a song in my heart .
buffy_summers What changed ?
angel Fed on a girl about your age ... beautiful ... dumb as a post ... but a favorite among her clan .
buffy_summers Her clan ?
angel Romany . Gypsies . The elders conjured the perfect punishment for me . They restored my soul .
buffy_summers What , they were all out of boils and blinding torment ?

angel When you become a vampire the demon takes your body , but it does n't get your soul . That 's gone ! No conscience , no remorse ... It 's an easy way to live . You have no idea what it 's like to have done the things I 've done ... and to care . I have n't fed on a living human being since that day .
buffy_summers So you started with my mom ?
angel I did n't bite her .
buffy_summers Then why did n't you say something ?
angel But I wanted to . I can walk like a man , but I 'm not one . I wanted to kill you tonight .
buffy_summers Go ahead .
buffy_summers Not as easy as it looks .
darla Sure it is !
willow_rosenberg We 're near the Bronze . What now ?
rupert_giles Keep looking for her .
xander_harris I have a question : what if we find her and she 's fighting Angel and some of his friends ? What the heck are we gon na do about it ?
darla Do you know what the saddest thing in the world is ?
buffy_summers Bad hair on top of that outfit ?
darla To love someone who used to love you .
buffy_summers You guys were involved ?
darla For several generations .
buffy_summers Well , you been around since Columbus , you are bound to pile up a few ex 's . You 're older than him , right ? Just between us girls , you are looking a little worn around the eyes .

darla I made him . There was a time when we shared everything , was n't there Angelus ? You had a chance to come home , to rule with me in the Master 's court for a thousand years , but you threw that away because of her . You love someone who hates us . You 're sick . And you 'll always be sick . And you 'll always remember what it was like to watch her die . You do n't think I came alone , do you ?
buffy_summers I know I did n't .
darla Hmm , scary .
darla Scarier !
darla Oh , do n't worry . Bullets ca n't kill vampires . Can hurt them like hell , but ... .
xander_harris Did you just hear ... .
darla So many body parts , so few bullets . Let 's begin with the kneecaps . No fun dancing without them .
darla Close , but no heart .
xander_harris We need to distract her , fast !
willow_rosenberg Buffy , it was n't Angel who attacked your mom , it was Darla !
darla C'mon , Buffy . Take it like a man !
darla Angel ?
collin Forget her .
the_master How dare you ? She was my favorite . For four hundred years ... .
collin She was weak . You do n't need her . I 'll bring you the Slayer .
the_master But to lose her to Angel ! He was to have sat at my right hand , come the day . And now ... .
collin They 're all against you . But soon you shall rise . And when you do ... ... we kill them all .
xander_harris Ah , the post - fumigation party .
buffy_summers Okay , so what 's the difference between this and the pre - fumigation party ?
xander_harris Much hardier cockroaches .
willow_rosenberg So , no word from Angel ?
buffy_summers Nah . It 's weird , though . In his way I feel like he 's still watching me .
willow_rosenberg Well , in a way he sort of is . In the way of that he 's right over there .
xander_harris I do n't need to watch because I 'm not threatened . Just gon na look this way .
angel I just wanted to see if you were okay . And your mother .
